The capital and largest town is Puerto Carreño. Vichada borders Venezuela to the north and east. ==Municipalities== # Cumaribo # La Primavera # Puerto Carreño # Santa Rosalía # San Jose de Ocune ==References== Category:Departments of Colombia Category:20th-century establishments in Colombia Category:1991 establishments in South America
